aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.text: Detail-oriented and results-driven professional with 4+ years of experience in system administration, process automation, and workflow optimization. Proven ability to reduce process cycle times by up to 40% through automation scripts and system re-engineering. Expertise in Python, SQL, and Jira administration, coupled with a deep understanding of data analysis for system monitoring and performance tracking. Eager to apply my skills in automation and system reliability to a challenging DevOps role, contributing to CI/CD pipeline development, infrastructure management, and cloud technologies.
